companies.name: Vila Chicken
companies.description: We are a chain of wood-fired chickens, in the process of expansion with more than 10 years in the market and a variant of the classic flavor of wood-fired chicken provided by the firewood used in our processes.

companies.name: Vivanda
companies.description: Vivanda is more than a supermarket, it is an innovative space with exclusive and high-quality products, oriented to the requirements of our customers, who seek to live new experiences to enjoy the freshness of life to the fullest.
